Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class represents the logic for the permutation guessing game. It manages the game state, including attempts, current permutation, and game history.

      public Game(int N)

  • Method Details

    • guess

      public void guess(List<Integer> guessList) throws InvalidInputException, OutOfBoundsException
      Processes the player's guess and provides feedback.
      Parameters:
      guessList - the player's guessed permutation
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - if the guess is not valid
      OutOfBoundsException - if the guess exceeds the allowed number of attempts

      Ends the game and logs the end event.
